DisplayForm.Script:
<UiScreen infoLevel="Normal"> <Title>title</Title> <AutoTransition>10</AutoTransition> <Operations> <Op type="Submit" action="./12.xml"> <Label imgsrc="submit.jpg">Submit</Label> </Op> <Op type="SkipGo" action="./8.xml"> <Label imgsrc="skipgo.jpg">Skipgo</Label> </Op> <Op type="Back" action="./10.xml"> <Label imgsrc="back.jpg">Back</Label> </Op> </Operations> <LinkScreen> <Description>Description (山梨県 Cyprus 徳島県 福井県 沖縄県 )</Description>
<!-- --> <LinkControl>
<LinkItem href="./9.xml"> <Label imgsrc="img01.jpg">LinkItem label 01</Label> </LinkItem>
<LinkItem href="./2.xml"> <Label imgsrc="img02.jpg">LinkItem label 02</Label> </LinkItem>
</LinkControl> </LinkScreen> </UiScreen>
